requirement_summary: General safety requirement for products placed on the market
description: Documentation demonstrating that only safe products are placed on the market, including risk assessment considering product characteristics, packaging, presentation, labelling, categories of consumers at risk (particularly children), and the product's reasonably foreseeable use
auditor_questions: Show me the safety assessment for this product considering all relevant risk factors
How do you determine if a product is safe for its reasonably foreseeable use?
What standards have you applied to demonstrate product safety?
How do you assess risks to vulnerable consumers, particularly children?

maturity_levels.basic: Product safety assessment performed, basic risk evaluation documented
maturity_levels.intermediate: Systematic risk assessment methodology, reference to applicable harmonized standards, consumer testing
maturity_levels.advanced: Comprehensive safety management system, predictive risk modelling, continuous post-market safety monitoring

description: Complete manufacturer compliance documentation including internal risk analysis, technical documentation, compliance with applicable safety requirements, product identification, manufacturer contact details on the product or packaging, and instructions and safety information in a language easily understood by consumers
auditor_questions: Show me the internal risk analysis and technical documentation for this product
How do you ensure products bear your name, registered trade name or trademark, and contact address?
Show me the instructions and safety information provided with the product
What sample testing and investigation programme do you operate for marketed products?

maturity_levels.basic: Technical documentation maintained, products labelled with required information
maturity_levels.intermediate: Systematic sample testing programme, documented complaint handling, proactive safety monitoring
maturity_levels.advanced: Integrated product safety management system, automated compliance checks in design phase, digital product passport

artifact_name: Authorized Representative Mandate and Compliance Records
description: Written mandate from the manufacturer appointing the authorized representative with defined tasks, including maintaining technical documentation and making it available to market surveillance authorities, cooperating with authorities, and informing the manufacturer of non-compliance
auditor_questions: Show me the written mandate from the manufacturer defining the authorized representative's tasks
How do you ensure technical documentation is available to market surveillance authorities on request?
What procedures do you have for cooperating with market surveillance authorities?
How do you communicate non-compliance issues back to the manufacturer?

maturity_levels.basic: Written mandate in place, basic cooperation procedures with authorities
maturity_levels.intermediate: Structured document management system, regular communication with manufacturer, proactive authority engagement
maturity_levels.advanced: Digital documentation management with instant retrieval, automated compliance monitoring, integrated manufacturer-representative reporting

description: Documented procedure for distributor due diligence before making a product available on the market, verifying that the manufacturer and importer have complied with their obligations including product identification, labelling, instructions, and CE marking where applicable
auditor_questions: Show me your due diligence procedure for verifying product compliance before distribution
How do you verify that the manufacturer has met labelling and documentation requirements?
What do you do when you have reason to believe a product is not safe?
Show me records of due diligence checks performed for recent product lines

maturity_levels.basic: Due diligence procedure documented, basic checks performed before distribution
maturity_levels.intermediate: Systematic verification checklists, supplier qualification process, non-compliance escalation procedures
maturity_levels.advanced: Automated compliance verification in supply chain systems, real-time product safety intelligence, integrated supplier management

artifact_name: Online Marketplace Product Safety Compliance Procedure
description: Documented procedures for online marketplace providers to ensure product safety, including a single point of contact for market surveillance authorities, registration on the Safety Gate portal, processes to act on notifications from authorities and the Safety Gate system, and random checks on product listings
auditor_questions: Show me your procedures for handling product safety notifications from authorities
Who is your designated single point of contact for market surveillance authorities?
How do you perform random checks on product listings for safety compliance?
Show me evidence of your registration and interaction with the Safety Gate system

maturity_levels.basic: Single point of contact designated, Safety Gate registration completed, basic listing checks
maturity_levels.intermediate: Automated Safety Gate integration, systematic random checks, proactive listing monitoring for safety signals
maturity_levels.advanced: AI-powered listing screening, real-time Safety Gate alerts, automated removal of unsafe products, seller verification programme

description: Records enabling traceability of products throughout the supply chain, including product identification (type, batch, serial number), manufacturer and importer identification, and records of economic operators to whom products have been supplied and from whom products have been received
auditor_questions: Show me how you can trace a product from manufacturer to end consumer
What product identification system do you use (batch, serial, barcode)?
Show me records of economic operators in the supply chain for a specific product
How quickly can you identify and locate products in the event of a recall?

maturity_levels.basic: Basic traceability records maintained with product identification and supply chain partners
maturity_levels.intermediate: Barcode or QR-code-based traceability, digital supply chain records, traceable to batch level
maturity_levels.advanced: Unit-level serialized traceability, blockchain or digital twin tracking, real-time supply chain visibility

requirement_summary: Product recalls and corrective actions by economic operators
artifact_name: Product Recall and Corrective Action Procedure
description: Documented procedure for initiating and managing product recalls and corrective actions when a product is found to be unsafe, including notification to competent authorities and consumers, direct consumer notification where possible, and provision of effective remedies (repair, replacement, refund)
auditor_questions: Show me your product recall procedure and past recall records
How do you notify consumers of a product recall, including direct notification?
What remedies do you offer to consumers (repair, replacement, refund)?
Show me evidence of notifications submitted to competent authorities for recalls

maturity_levels.basic: Recall procedure documented, basic authority notification process
maturity_levels.intermediate: Tested recall simulation exercises, multi-channel consumer notification, tracked remedy fulfilment
maturity_levels.advanced: Automated recall management system, direct digital consumer notification, real-time recall effectiveness monitoring

description: Records of notifications submitted to or received from the EU rapid alert system (Safety Gate) for dangerous products, including product identification, risk description, measures taken, and follow-up actions by national authorities
auditor_questions: Show me all Safety Gate notifications related to your products
How do you monitor the Safety Gate system for notifications affecting your product categories?
What is your process for responding to Safety Gate alerts from authorities?
Show me evidence of corrective actions taken in response to Safety Gate notifications

maturity_levels.basic: Safety Gate notifications submitted when required, basic monitoring of alerts
maturity_levels.intermediate: Proactive Safety Gate monitoring, structured response procedures, documented corrective action tracking
maturity_levels.advanced: Automated Safety Gate integration with product safety systems, predictive safety analytics, cross-border incident coordination

description: Documentation of cooperation with market surveillance authorities, including responses to information requests, provision of technical documentation, outcomes of authority inspections, and compliance with corrective measures imposed by authorities
auditor_questions: Show me records of your interactions with market surveillance authorities
How do you respond to information requests from market surveillance authorities?
Show me evidence of compliance with any corrective measures imposed by authorities
What internal procedures do you have for cooperating with market surveillance inspections?

maturity_levels.basic: Basic cooperation with authorities, reactive response to information requests
maturity_levels.intermediate: Designated regulatory affairs contact, structured response procedures, documented corrective measure tracking
maturity_levels.advanced: Proactive regulatory engagement, integrated compliance management system, continuous improvement based on authority feedback
